channel.title: Burthrope Games Room
channel.description:
I've never seen Burthrope Games Room in a Private Server. Do you think anyone would play it if it was 100% and you could stake people coins on any game type. In my opinion, it would add another aspect into the economy; players that are good at boards games would get rich from it. It would also compete with staking as a way to get fast money, but in a different way.
What do you think?

item.title: Burthrope Games Room
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

there’s been a few people who’ve made the games. though they arent hard at all to make.

Read full topic

item.title: Burthrope Games Room
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

When you’re talking private servers, you’re talking about screaming 13 year old kids that only want mod and that want to screenie their most recent max hit to masturbate over, not people who ever really invested time into the little minigames of Runescape

Read full topic

item.title: Burthrope Games Room
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

I haven’t seen many players playing those types of games at runescape. But however, it might be a good unique feature for your server and I wish you all chances to succeed.

Read full topic
